name: Son Of Cloy Hell Dimension 0
description:
First Game in Late Alpha  with a heavy OST

Leave Comments on what you think or suggestions.

Controls

enable mouse shooting with right click or H

SHOOT LEFT MOUSE BUTTON OR XBOXONE RIGHT TRIGGER

AD or XBOXONE joystick to move

Enter or XBOXONE A to continue conversation

SPACE OR XBOXONE A to jump

MOUSE AIM OR XBOXONE RIGHT JOYSTICK

S OR XBOXONE X TO CROUCH

PARTIAL WIRED SWITCH CORE PLUS SUPPORT
